actions.name: DeleteNotificationConfigurationForDelegatedAdmin
actions.description: Grants permission to the organization management account to delete email notification preferences from a delegated administrator account for Trusted Advisor Priority

actions.name: DescribeAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to view the AWS Support plan and various AWS Trusted Advisor preferences

actions.name: DescribeAccountAccess
actions.description: Grants permission to view if the AWS account has enabled or disabled AWS Trusted Advisor

actions.name: DescribeCheckItems
actions.description: Grants permission to view details for the check items

actions.name: DescribeCheckRefreshStatuses
actions.description: Grants permission to view the refresh statuses for AWS Trusted Advisor checks

actions.name: DescribeCheckStatusHistoryChanges
actions.description: Grants permission to view the results and changed statuses for checks in the last 30 days

actions.name: DescribeCheckSummaries
actions.description: Grants permission to view AWS Trusted Advisor check summaries

actions.name: DescribeChecks
actions.description: Grants permission to view details for AWS Trusted Advisor checks

actions.name: DescribeNotificationConfigurations
actions.description: Grants permission to get your email notification preferences for Trusted Advisor Priority

actions.name: DescribeNotificationPreferences
actions.description: Grants permission to view the notification preferences for the AWS account

actions.name: DescribeOrganization
actions.description: Grants permission to view if the AWS account meets the requirements to enable the organizational view feature

actions.name: DescribeOrganizationAccounts
actions.description: Grants permission to view the linked AWS accounts that are in the organization

actions.name: DescribeReports
actions.description: Grants permission to view details for organizational view reports, such as the report name, runtime, date created, status, and format

actions.name: DescribeRisk
actions.description: Grants permission to view risk details in AWS Trusted Advisor Priority

actions.name: DescribeRiskResources
actions.description: Grants permission to view affected resources for a risk in AWS Trusted Advisor Priority

actions.name: DescribeRisks
actions.description: Grants permission to view risks in AWS Trusted Advisor Priority

actions.name: DescribeServiceMetadata
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about organizational view reports, such as the AWS Regions, check categories, check names, and resource statuses

actions.name: DownloadRisk
actions.description: Grants permission to download a file that contains details about the risk in AWS Trusted Advisor Priority

actions.name: ExcludeCheckItems
actions.description: Grants permission to exclude recommendations for AWS Trusted Advisor checks

actions.name: GenerateReport
actions.description: Grants permission to create a report for AWS Trusted Advisor checks in your organization

actions.name: IncludeCheckItems
actions.description: Grants permission to include recommendations for AWS Trusted Advisor checks

actions.name: ListAccountsForParent
actions.description: Grants permission to view, in the Trusted Advisor console, all of the accounts in an AWS organization that are contained by a root or organizational unit (OU)

actions.name: ListOrganizationalUnitsForParent
actions.description: Grants permission to view, in the Trusted Advisor console, all of the organizational units (OUs) in a parent organizational unit or root

actions.name: ListRoots
actions.description: Grants permission to view, in the Trusted Advisor console, all of the roots that are defined in an AWS organization

actions.name: RefreshCheck
actions.description: Grants permission to refresh an AWS Trusted Advisor check

actions.name: SetAccountAccess
actions.description: Grants permission to enable or disable AWS Trusted Advisor for the account

actions.name: SetOrganizationAccess
actions.description: Grants permission to enable the organizational view feature for AWS Trusted Advisor

actions.name: UpdateNotificationConfigurations
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update your email notification preferences for Trusted Advisor Priority

actions.name: UpdateNotificationPreferences
actions.description: Grants permission to update notification preferences for AWS Trusted Advisor

actions.name: UpdateRiskStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to update the risk status in AWS Trusted Advisor Priority
